file_content.text: We've never met.
I handled your cover-up. As far as anyone will know, the rebels killed that Chiss.
Excellent. And I have heard nothing of it, which is even better.
Please accept this payment. For your service... and your silence.
Please hurry and place the footage before the Chiss delegation wonders where their man went.
My lord, I have heard much about your accomplishments.
Agent. Just who I was hoping might choose this moment to visit Sobrik.
Ah, a bounty hunter. You may have just stepped into a job opportunity.
I understand you are not averse to occasional... off-the-record tasks which require some discretion?
One of our officers just had an unfortunate dust-up with a valuable delegate and we need to... doctor the results.
I'm all about results.
I might be able to help.
So I've heard.
Why don't you lay out the situation first.
What kind of dust-up?
I'm not cleaning your mess.
This is of great importance to the Balmorran occupation effort. We could pay you handsomely.
This... officer recently quarreled with one of our Chiss delegates. The delegate did not survive.
The Chiss have provided us valuable intelligence on many planets in the war. We do not wish to strain relations with them.
As you know, the Chiss have provided some of our most valuable intelligence in the war. We do not want to see relations with them strained.
You want me to work against my own people?
Why come to me?
I understand from your reputation that you have put the needs of the Empire above all other loyalties.
The Chiss have provided crucial intelligence here and elsewhere in the war. It would not do to strain relations with them.
We cannot allow our people to look weak before our allies.
We must maintain control.
Precisely, my lord.
This won't be the first cover-up I've been part of.
I can make this disappear.
Ah, good. You take my meaning.
You looking for me to take out the witnesses?
So who else needs killing?
In part. The delegate's bodyguards survived, though we have isolated them.
So what do you need?
We have doctored a security recording to make it appear that Balmorran rebels attacked the delegate.
We need someone with no direct connection to this officer to go to the room where the murder occurred and upload the doctored footage to the security cameras.
With luck, we can turn this into a galvanizing point against the rebels.
An excellent plan.
Agreed.
Where do you need me?
The delegate was killed in the back room of a cantina--I'll give you the coordinates.
We've isolated his bodyguards inside. They're witnesses, so they'll need to be eliminated. Their deaths will also be attributed to the rebels.
Just tell our man at the door that you're working for Breerdin and he'll let you pass.
Cover-ups always backfire. Throw this idiot officer to the wolves and be done with it.
A poor plan. [Refuse quest]
Perhaps we must.
We are the Empire! We do not need allies!
Ridiculous! [Refuse quest]
I wish it were that simple.
If the guy's already dead, there's not much more I can do for you.
Not my thing. [Refuse quest]
Perhaps you're right. This should be handled internally. Please do not spread word around.
Please carry on.
